content: The Loong Pearl is one of the advanced materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game and can be found several times in one through.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Loong_Pearl.md', within the main section titled 'Loong Pearl'.
The content is as follows:
The Loong Pearl is one of the advanced materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for upgrades like many of the other materials in the game and can be found several times in one through.
